page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: RECREATION For the people living in this area there are a number of outdoor activities which they can follow. The local gardens show that gardening must be a popular and successful hobby. In June roses,lupin and delphinium dominated.Horse riding is popular and there were several stables in and near this area.No doubt some of the riders participate in hunting as the area lies within the Beaufort Hunt district. For more modern entertainment it is necessary to go to the nearest towns and for young people the opportunity for discos is limited.One local goes regularly to a Bridge club at Old Sodbury. It is obvious that like many others in Britain,watching television is a major leisure activity.
